news_header: Zacks.com highlights stocks in the Analyst Blog, focusing on energy companies like Permian Resources, Antero Midstream, and TC Energy as they prepare for fourth-quarter earnings amidst stable oil prices.
news_original_title: The Zacks Analyst Blog Permian Resources, Antero Midstream, TC Energy and Antero Resources
news_text: Zacks.com has released a list of stocks featured in its Analyst Blog, including Permian Resources Corp., Antero Midstream Corp., and TC Energy Corp. As the fourth-quarter earnings season begins, these companies are expected to report better-than-expected results due to a favorable pricing environment. The stability in oil prices has positively impacted exploration and production activities, while midstream companies continue to benefit from stable, fee-based revenues. Zacks' proprietary methodology helps identify stocks with high chances of positive earnings surprises. The report also emphasizes the growing demand for nuclear energy as a potential investment opportunity.
